channel.title: Glitches/All Magic Animations. -EDIT!
channel.description:
I finally found the server I wanted, and, there seems to be a lot of glitches on it, I mean A LOT! So, with that, I'm gonna try and see if anyone can help me with any of them. :) (Tell me if pics are needed for better understanding).
1. When you fish, the guy like splits apart and doesn't do the correct animation. (I tried changing the animation and that worked but, he still like, spaces out of himself).
2. When you die and spawn back, you can't move, you have to log-out and log-back-in.
3. The magic works pretty darn good, except, when I cast air strike, it shows both the water and air strike animations.
This is only a [b]few[/b] but I can do the rest on my own.
[b]EDIT:[/b]
Does anyone happen to have all the magic animations? I need them to fix mine.

item.title: Glitches/All Magic Animations. -EDIT!
item.dc:creator: @F-0-N-Z-Y F-0-N-Z-Y
item.description:
@F-0-N-Z-Y wrote:

[quote=“Scarr, post:1, topic:200352”]I finally found the server I wanted, and, there seems to be a lot of glitches on it, I mean A LOT! So, with that, I’m gonna try and see if anyone can help me with any of them. (Tell me if pics are needed for better understanding).

  1. When you fish, the guy like splits apart and doesn’t do the correct animation. (I tried changing the animation and that worked but, he still like, spaces out of himself).

  2. When you die and spawn back, you can’t move, you have to log-out and log-back-in.

  3. The magic works pretty darn good, except, when I cast air strike, it shows both the water and air strike animations.

This is only a few but I can do the rest on my own.[/quote]

ok, the windstrike is easy, look it up in client.java

should be like

if(magicID == 1152

find the “setanimation” line, replace it/them with:

setAnimation(711);

see if that helps.

Read full topic

item.title: Glitches/All Magic Animations. -EDIT!

item.description:
@Scarr wrote:

I finally found the server I wanted, and, there seems to be a lot of glitches on it, I mean A LOT! So, with that, I’m gonna try and see if anyone can help me with any of them. (Tell me if pics are needed for better understanding).

  1. When you fish, the guy like splits apart and doesn’t do the correct animation. (I tried changing the animation and that worked but, he still like, spaces out of himself).

  2. When you die and spawn back, you can’t move, you have to log-out and log-back-in.

  3. The magic works pretty darn good, except, when I cast air strike, it shows both the water and air strike animations.

This is only a few but I can do the rest on my own.

EDIT:

Does anyone happen to have all the magic animations? I need them to fix mine.
